importPageInfo.message: Drag and Drop the nodes below to the Link Map Tree to import the data.

welcomeIntro.message: Link Map is a browser extension that helps you organize your tabs.

welcomeIntro2.message: It is still in early development, so please be patient with us. More features are coming soon!

welcomeIntro3.message: Now we have prepare some tips to help you get in to this place.

welcomeIntro4.message: You could just close this popup and follow the nodes named "🚀 Tips" to move on.

tipsDnd.message: Drag and drop to re-arrange nodes

tipsEdit.message: Click edit to rename a node

tipsDelete.message: Click Delete to delete a node

tipsDeleteAll.message: Collapse the parent node to delete all its children

tipsRClick.message: Right click to show context menu

tipsSettings.message: Click settings icon to perform export/import

tipsFeedback2.message: Use Feedback button in the settings to send feedback

tipsFinish.message: Finish! you can delete these nodes now
